c:complexType.name: StackedDotChart
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the Stacked Dot chart.
For information on the supported data formats see .

c:property.name: point
c:property.c:documentation: The point plot is the main plot of the stacked dot chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "point" property suffix.

c:complexType.name: StackedDotPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the stacked dot plot.

c:property.name: stacked
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type is necessarily stacked.

c:property.name: dotsVisible
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type necessarily shows dots/markers.
